title: Manoharam Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram
materials: vibrant green) and brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS clarity
features: Intricately crafted open-lattice neckline with diamond-studded geometric designs. The central pendant showcases a majestic peacock motif (Mayura design), adorned with emeralds and diamonds. Traditional gold bead dangles provide a touch of movement and elegance. All stones are meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize sparkle.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Perfect for brides and attendees seeking a statement piece.
description: A timeless masterpiece blending traditional South Indian design with modern brilliance. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds exude luxury. Handcrafted with exceptional attention to detail, ensuring lasting beauty and durability. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, royalty, and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom.
